T01n810u_001:4: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 1 ||
T01n810u_001:5: hṛṣṭo hūkāravajraḥ paśupatidamako vajraghaṇṭā ca hṛṣṭā
T01n810u_001:8: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 2 ||
T01n810u_001:12: tuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 3 ||
T01n810u_001:15: māyūrī māmakī ca kṣapitaripugaṇā pāṇḍarā rocanādyā-
T01n810u_001:16: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 4 ||
T01n810u_001:19: keyūrī jñānasārā dhvajanihitakarā ṣaṭkarā śābarī ca
T01n810u_001:20: tuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 5 ||
T01n810u_001:21: vaiṇyā mālyā sugītā prathitajinavare śābarī dhūpavajrā
T01n810u_001:24: tuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 6 ||
T01n810u_001:28: tuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 7 ||
T01n810u_001:29: chatraṃ dūrvā ca padmaṃ dhvajamapi nihitaṃ lo(ro)
T01n810u_001:33: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 8 ||
